Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
Due Date: Not explicitly stated; inferred to be before the August board meeting for awarding.
Bid Submission Type: Not explicitly stated; inferred to require electronic submission given the context of additional warranty information submission.
Term of Bid: Not explicitly stated; inferred to start with projects from September 2024 based on delivery timeline.
Installation Requirements: All deliveries and deployments must incorporate white glove services, which include asset decaling, asset reporting, etching, and delivery to varied locations.
Delivery Timeline: Dallas ISD is anticipating requesting quotes for different projects from awarded vendors starting in September of 2024.
Payment Terms: Dallas ISD will primarily be using bond-funded money to purchase devices.
Required Documentation: Additional warranty information and pricing can be submitted as an attachment.
Manufacturer Registration: Dallas ISD will ask all warranties to be made by OEM.
Product Models: Specific models not mentioned; vendors are asked to propose make and model of the device being proposed.
Product Categories: Student Chromebooks, Student and Staff Windows laptops
Contact Information: Not explicitly provided in the provided text.
Bid Objective Summary: To provide responses to vendors’ questions related to the RFP for student and staff computing devices, including specifications and warranty requirements.

Technical Specifications.USB Port Requirement: USB 3.1 is a minimum requirement; higher specifications are permissible.
Technical Specifications.Etching Requirement: Only required on laptops, not on stand-alone monitors or AIO computers.
Technical Specifications.Warranty Requirement: A one-year warranty for student Chromebooks and three years for student and staff Windows laptops as a minimum requirement.
